description.raw:
This adds a script to detect the major version of an ignition package by looking at its CMakeLists.txt, looking for a `set(PROJECT_MAJOR_VERSION \d` first and if that doesn't match, then it searches for `project(ignition-[a-z\-]*\d` and uses that instead. I've tested it locally on a bunch of different ignition projects, and it seems to detect the correct major version in each case.

I'm using that script to detect if ign-transport4+ is in use; so that a script compatible with ign-cmake can be used; otherwise it uses the old script.

Testing:

* [ign-transport3](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-windows7-amd64/11/console) fails but for an unrelated reason (path name is too long)
* [ign-transport4](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/534/) successful
